word_mean: 铁：存在于某些矿石、几乎所有土壤以及矿泉水中的一种金属元素
化学符号Fe。铁是血红蛋白、细胞色素以及其他呼吸酶成分的不可缺少的组成物，主要功能是携带氧给组织(血红蛋白)和参与细胞氧化机制。铁储备匮乏可致缺铁性贫血症(见anemia项下)。贫血时用于促进造血。铁化合物具收敛作用

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English īren, īsen, īsern, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch ijzer and German Eisen, and probably ultimately from Celtic

encyclopedia.content: 铁是一种化学元素，它的化学符号是Fe，它的原子序数是26，是最常用的金属。它是过渡金属的一种。是地壳含量第二高的金属元素。中国是最早发现和掌握炼铁技术的国家。1973年在中国河北省出土了一件商代铁刃青铜钺，表明中国劳动人民早在3300多年以前就认识了铁，熟悉了铁的锻造性能，识别了铁与青铜在性质上的差别，把铁铸在铜兵器的刃部，加强铜的坚韧性。经科学鉴定，证明铁刃是用陨铁锻成的。随着青铜熔炼技术的成熟，逐渐为铁的冶炼技术的发展创造了条件。人体中也含有铁。另外，铁还常被用做姓氏等。

entry.def: Iron is an element which usually takes the form of a hard, dark grey metal. It is used to make steel, and also forms part of many tools, buildings, and vehicles. Very small amounts of iron occur in your blood and in food.

example.ex: The huge, iron gate was locked.
...the highest grade iron ore deposits in the world...
example.tran: 世界上最优质的铁矿层

entry.def: An iron is an electrical device with a flat metal base. You heat it until the base is hot, then rub it over clothes to remove creases.
If you iron clothes, you remove the creases from them using an iron.

example.ex: She used to iron his shirts...

entry.def: You can use iron to describe the character or behaviour of someone who is very firm in their decisions and actions, or who can control their feelings well.

example.ex: ...a man of icy nerve and iron will...
example.tran: 有着冰一样冷静的神经与钢铁般坚强意志的人

example.ex: She delighted in the nickname, the 'iron lady'.
example.tran: 她喜爱这个昵称——“铁娘子”。

entry.def: Iron is used in expressions such as an iron hand and iron discipline to describe strong, harsh, or unfair methods of control which do not allow people much freedom.

example.ex: He died in 1985 after ruling Albania with an iron fist for 40 years.
example.tran: 在以铁腕统治阿尔巴尼亚 40 年后，他于1985年去世。

example.ex: ...a people living permanently in the iron grip of poverty.
example.tran: 永远无法摆脱贫困生活的民族

entry.tran: 同时要做的几件事情;同时进行的多个计划
entry.def: If someone has a lot of irons in the fire, they are involved in several different activities or have several different plans.

example.ex: Too many irons in the fire can sap your energy and prevent you from seeing which path to take.
example.tran: 同时做太多事会使你精力衰竭,让你不知道该做哪件事。

entry.def: If someone pumps iron, they exercise by lifting weights using special machines.

means.word_mean: 1. a heavy ductile magnetic metallic element; is silver-white in pure form but readily rusts; used in construction and tools and armament; plays a role in the transport of oxygen by the blood
2. a golf club that has a relatively narrow metal head
3. metal shackles; for hands or legs
4. implement used to brand live stock
5. home appliance consisting of a flat metal base that is heated and used to smooth cloth
1. press and smooth with a heated iron;

example.en: That pig-iron you gave me really burned out my throat.
example.zh: 你拾我喝的那种劣质酒几乎把我的喉咙都烧穿理了。

example.en: Max is an iron-burner,not a carpenter.
example.zh: 麦克斯是铁 匠，不是木匠。

example.en: Please don't serve me any of your scrap iron.
example.zh: 请别拿你的什么蹩脚酒给我喝。
